CorePluginsAdmin.AllowedUploadFormats: You may upload a plugin or theme in .zip format via this page.
CorePluginsAdmin.BeCarefulUsingPlugins: Plugins that are not authored by Piwik team must be used with care: we did not review them.
CorePluginsAdmin.BeCarefulUsingThemes: Themes that are not authored by Piwik team must be used with care: we did not review them.
CorePluginsAdmin.ChangeSettingsPossible: You can change %ssettings%s for this plugin.
CorePluginsAdmin.CorePluginTooltip: Core plugins have no version since they are distributed with Piwik.
CorePluginsAdmin.DevelopersLearnHowToDevelopPlugins: Developers: Learn how you can extend and customize Piwik by %sdeveloping plugins or themes%s.
CorePluginsAdmin.DoMoreContactPiwikAdmins: To install a new plugin or a new theme, please get in touch with your Piwik admins.
CorePluginsAdmin.EmailToEnquireUpdatedVersion: Please email %1$s and enquire an updated version of %2$s.
CorePluginsAdmin.ChangeLookByManageThemes: You can change the appearance of Piwik by %sManaging Themes%s.
CorePluginsAdmin.GetEarlyAccessForPaidPlugins: Note: all plugins are available for free at present; in the future we will enable Paid Plugins in the Marketplace (%scontact us%s for early access).
CorePluginsAdmin.InfoPluginUpdateIsRecommended: Update your plugins now to benefit from the latest improvements.
CorePluginsAdmin.InfoThemeIsUsedByOtherUsersAsWell: Note: the other %1$s users registered in this Piwik are also using the theme %2$s.
CorePluginsAdmin.InfoThemeUpdateIsRecommended: Update your themes to enjoy the latest version.
CorePluginsAdmin.PluginsExtendPiwik: Plugins extend and expand the functionality of Piwik.
CorePluginsAdmin.OncePluginIsInstalledYouMayActivateHere: Once a plugin is installed, you may activate it or deactivate it here.
CorePluginsAdmin.MissingRequirementsNotice: Please update %1$s %2$s to a newer version, %1$s %3$s is required.
CorePluginsAdmin.MissingRequirementsPleaseInstallNotice: Please install %1$s %2$s as it is required by %3$s.
CorePluginsAdmin.NotAllowedToBrowseMarketplacePlugins: You can browse the list of plugins that can be installed to customize or extend your Piwik platform. Please contact your administrator if you need any of these installed.
CorePluginsAdmin.NotAllowedToBrowseMarketplaceThemes: You can browse the list of themes that can be installed to customize the appearance of the Piwik platform. Please contact your administrator to get any of these installed for you.
CorePluginsAdmin.PluginNotWorkingAlternative: If you've been using this plugin, maybe you can find a more recent version in the Marketplace. If not, you may want to uninstall it.
CorePluginsAdmin.PluginUpdateAvailable: You are using version %s and a new version %s is available.
CorePluginsAdmin.StepPluginSuccessfullyInstalled: You have successfully installed the plugin %1$s %2$s.
CorePluginsAdmin.StepPluginSuccessfullyUpdated: You have successfully updated the plugin %1$s %2$s.
CorePluginsAdmin.StepThemeSuccessfullyInstalled: You have successfully installed the theme %1$s %2$s.
CorePluginsAdmin.StepThemeSuccessfullyUpdated: You have successfully updated the theme %1$s %2$s.
CorePluginsAdmin.TeaserExtendPiwik: Extend Piwik with Plugins and Themes
CorePluginsAdmin.TeaserExtendPiwikByPlugin: Extend Piwik by installing a new plugin
CorePluginsAdmin.TeaserExtendPiwikByTheme: Enjoy another look & feel by installing a new theme
CorePluginsAdmin.TeaserExtendPiwikByUpload: Extend Piwik by uploading a ZIP file
CorePluginsAdmin.InstallingNewPluginViaMarketplaceOrUploa: You may automatically install plugins from the Marketplace or %supload a plugin%s in .zip format.
CorePluginsAdmin.ThemesDescription: Themes can change the appearance of Piwik user interface, and provide a completely new visual experience to enjoy your analytics reports.
CorePluginsAdmin.UninstallConfirm: You are about to uninstall a plugin %s. The plugin will be completely removed from your platform and it won't be recoverable. Are you sure you want to do this?
